thread.title: Two big reasons millennials really use Tinder (hint: not to hook up)
thread.title_full: Two big reasons millennials really use Tinder (hint: not to hook up)

author: USA TODAY
title: Two big reasons millennials really use Tinder (hint: not to hook up)
text:
EMAIL 
Swipe left, swipe left, swipe right. 
Millennials swipe repeatedly on the popular mobile matching app, Tinder, except they arenâ€™t getting lucky. 
In a LendEDU survey of college students , 72% of more than 3,800 students surveyed said they hadnâ€™t met with a match on Tinder. Only 29% had. Tinder says there are 1.4 billion swipes daily, along with 26 million matches per day. 
And good luck trying to find a relationship on Tinder. Tinder is such a strange thing. Like I match people but I never actually talk to them so to me it's just a gameðŸ˜‚ 
Millennials are using Tinder for reasons not even remotely close to serious dating. 44% of about 9,700 college students surveyed said they used the app for two other reasons: 
1. For a confidence booster I just have a tinder for the confidence boost and lately I've been matching with nearly everyone I swipe right on so that's lit
